gobblin.util.filesystem

Interface PathAlterationListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ExceptionCatchingPathAlterationListenerDecorator, PathAlterationListenerAdaptor

    public interface PathAlterationListener
    A listener that receives events of general file system modifications. A generalized version Of FileAlterationListener interface using Path as the parameter for each method
    See Also:
    FileAlterationListener
